backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Application - Under the Planning Act - 1 Front Street West

decisionBody: Toronto and East York Community Council
noticeDescription:
NOTICE OF APPLICATION(S)

(Under the Planning Act)

 

The City has received the following application(s) under the Planning Act:

 

TORONTO AND EAST YORK COMMUNITY COUNCIL AREA:

 

Application Number: 25 183122 STE 10 OZ

Application to Amend the Official Plan and Zoning By-law to modify requirements for the previously approved development at 1 Front Street West that permitted two towers above the Dominion Public Building (45 and 49 storeys). The proposed amendments include replacing the hotel use previously proposed with residential uses as well as a reduction in parking requirements. A total gross floor area of 90,000 square metres is proposed including 46,747 square metres of non-residential floor area and 592 dwelling units.

1 Front Street West

Ward 10 – Spadina-Fort York

Susan McAlpine, Planner at 416-392-7622 or Susan.McAlpine@toronto.ca 

 

CONTACT INFORMATION

 

City Clerk, Attention: Registrar Secretariat

Toronto City Hall, 2nd Floor West, 100 Queen Street West, Toronto, ON, M5H 2N2,

Tel: 416-394-8101, Email: RegistrarCCO@toronto.ca 

 

BACKGROUND INFORMATION

 

Background information and materials regarding the above-listed proposals are available at www.toronto.ca/city-government/planning-development/application-information-centre/.   

 

FURTHER INFORMATION

 

If you wish to receive notice regarding the progression of any of the proposed applications above, which include Official Plan amendment, proposed Draft Plan of Subdivision, Draft Plan of Common Elements Condominium, Vacant Land Condominium Application and/or proposed Zoning By-law amendment, you may make a request to the City Clerk, to the attention of the Registrar Secretariat, at the address or email noted above.
title: Notice of Application - Under the Planning Act - 1 Front Street West
